Package com.facebook.buck.core.starlark.rule

Interface SkylarkRuleContextActionsApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SkylarkRuleContextActions
    public interface SkylarkRuleContextActionsApi
    Struct containing methods that create actions within the implementation function of a user defined rule
